// src/components/ProductGrid.js
import React,{useState}from"react";import{Container,Row,Col,Card,Button}from"react-bootstrap";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import products from"../../Data/Products";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductGrid=()=>{const[hovered,setHovered]=useState(null);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"my-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center fw-bold",children:"ALGUNOS DE NUESTROS PRODUCTOS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"mt-3 gx-1",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:4,className:"mb-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:`h-100 text-center shadow-sm ${hovered===product.id?"shadow-lg":""}`,style:{transform:hovered===product.id?"scale(0.80)":"scale(0.70)",transition:"all 0.3s ease-in-out"},onMouseEnter:()=>setHovered(product.id),onMouseLeave:()=>setHovered(null),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:product.img,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{className:"fw-semibold",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/product/${product.id}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:hovered===product.id?"dark":"danger",className:"mt-1",children:"CONSULTAR"})})]})]})},product.id))})]});};export default ProductGrid;
